subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Sam Querrey rallied in the second tie breaker and took advantage of a faltering John Isner in the third set to win the Morgan Keegan Championships in Memphis, 6-7 (3), 7-6 (5), 6-3.
snippet: Sam Querrey rallied in the second tie breaker and took advantage of a faltering John Isner in the third set to win the Morgan Keegan Championships in Memphis, 6-7 (3), 7-6 (5), 6-3.
